summary: A fantasy-thriller set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.
cast: Konstantin Khabenskiy|Vladimir Menshov|Valeriy Zolotukhin|Mariya Poroshina|Galina Tyunina|Yuriy Kutsenko|Aleksey Chadov|Zhanna Friske|Ilya Lagutenko|Viktor Verzhbitskiy|Rimma Markova|Mariya Mironova|Aleksey Maklakov|Aleksandr Samoylenko|Dmitriy Martynov|Anna Slyu|Anna Dubrovskaya|Sergey Prikhodko|Igor Savochkin|Georgiy Dronov|Nikolay Olyalin|Dmitriy Klokov|Dmitriy Osetrov|Konstantin Murzenko|Anatoliy Gorin|Lyudmila Yaronova|Aleksandr Shchurok|Nikolay Kiselev|Marina Ivanova|Viktor Ivanov|Polina Shchurok|Tatyana Shchankina|Aleksandr Kozlov|Igor Pismennyy|Viktoriya Smirnova|Sergey Kalashnikov|Ekaterina Malikova|Vladislav Anufriev|Yuriy Yakovlev|Ivan Popov|Aleksey Kurochkin|Yaroslav Romashenko|Yuri Lowenthal|Darian Weiss|Blestyashchie|Igor Gasparyan|Yuliya Kovalchuk|Igor Lifanov|Oleg Mokshantsev|Aleksandra Nazarova|Aleksey Neklyudov|Kseniya Novikova|Anna Semenovich|Galina Stakhanova|Stepan Starchikov
title: Guardianes de la noche
